title: Harris Wofford: "Of Kennedys and Kings"
description: Michael's interview with Senator Harris Wofford, author of "Of Kennedys And Kings: Making Sense of the Sixties." The late Senator passed away in January 2019. This interview was conducted on 5 June 2008. The book was published in 1980.
author: podcasts@siriusxm.com (Harris Wofford, Michael Smerconish)
